Synopsis: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: Silo
Cast: Stars:, Rebecca Ferguson, , Tim Robbins, , Common, , Harriet Walter
Synopsis: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Cast: Director:, Steven Caple Jr., | ,     Stars:, Anthony Ramos, , Dominique Fishback, , Luna Lauren Velez, , Dean Scott Vazquez

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise

Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Synopsis: A prequel to Star Trek: The Original Series, the show follows the crew of the USS Enterprise under Captain Christopher Pike.

Synopsis: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Sam Worthington, , Zoe Saldana, , Sigourney Weaver, , Stephen Lang
Synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Doctor Who
Cast: Stars:, Jodie Whittaker, , Peter Capaldi, , Pearl Mackie, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

Synopsis: An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.

Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Synopsis: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

Title: The Orville
Cast: Stars:, Seth MacFarlane, , Adrianne Palicki, , Penny Johnson Jerald, , Scott Grimes
Synopsis: Set 400 years in the future, finds the crew of the U.S.S. Orville continuing their mission of exploration, as they navigate both the mysteries of the universe and the complexities of their own interpersonal relationships.

Title: Rick and Morty
Cast: Stars:, Justin Roiland, , Chris Parnell, , Spencer Grammer, , Sarah Chalke
Synopsis: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Cast: Director:, Jon Watts, | ,     Stars:, Tom Holland, , Zendaya, , Benedict Cumberbatch, , Jacob Batalon
Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
Cast: Stars:, Patrick Stewart, , Brent Spiner, , Jonathan Frakes, , LeVar Burton
Synopsis: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's 5-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers sets off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on its own mission to go where no one has gone before.

Title: Star Trek: Picard
Cast: Stars:, Patrick Stewart, , Michelle Hurd, , Jeri Ryan, , Alison Pill
Synopsis: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard in the next chapter of his life.

Title: The X-Files
Cast: Stars:, David Duchovny, , Gillian Anderson, , Mitch Pileggi, , William B. Davis
Synopsis: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Zoe Saldana, , Dave Bautista, , Vin Diesel
Synopsis: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Title: Inception
Cast: Director:, Christopher Nolan, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Joseph Gordon-Levitt, , Elliot Page, , Ken Watanabe
Synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Title: The Swarm
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Karim, , Cécile de France, , Leonie Benesch, , Joshua Odjick
Synopsis: Ecological thriller about the delicate interconnectedness between mankind and Earth.

Title: Foundation
Cast: Stars:, Lou Llobell, , Jared Harris, , Lee Pace, , Leah Harvey
Synopsis: A complex saga of humans scattered on planets throughout the galaxy all living under the rule of the Galactic Empire.

Title: Titans
Cast: Stars:, Brenton Thwaites, , Anna Diop, , Ryan Potter, , Teagan Croft
Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: The Handmaid's Tale
Cast: Stars:, Elisabeth Moss, , Yvonne Strahovski, , Ann Dowd, , O-T Fagbenle
Synopsis: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

Title: Andor
Cast: Stars:, Diego Luna, , Kyle Soller, , Stellan Skarsgård, , Genevieve O'Reilly
Synopsis: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One'. In an era filled with danger, deception and intrigue, Cassian will embark on the path that is destined to turn him into a Rebel hero.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Dark
Cast: Stars:, Louis Hofmann, , Karoline Eichhorn, , Lisa Vicari, , Maja Schöne
Synopsis: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Joaquim Dos Santos, , Kemp Powers, , Justin K. Thompson, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Brian Tyree Henry, , Luna Lauren Velez
Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: Silo
Cast: Stars:, Rebecca Ferguson, , Tim Robbins, , Common, , Harriet Walter
Synopsis: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: Black Mirror
Cast: Stars:, Daniel Lapaine, , Hannah John-Kamen, , Michaela Coel, , Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Title: The Last of Us

Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Synopsis: A complex saga of humans scattered on planets throughout the galaxy all living under the rule of the Galactic Empire.

Title: Titans
Cast: Stars:, Brenton Thwaites, , Anna Diop, , Ryan Potter, , Teagan Croft
Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: The Handmaid's Tale
Cast: Stars:, Elisabeth Moss, , Yvonne Strahovski, , Ann Dowd, , O-T Fagbenle
Synopsis: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

Title: Andor
Cast: Stars:, Diego Luna, , Kyle Soller, , Stellan Skarsgård, , Genevieve O'Reilly
Synopsis: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One'. In an era filled with danger, deception and intrigue, Cassian will embark on the path that is destined to turn him into a Rebel hero.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Dark
Cast: Stars:, Louis Hofmann, , Karoline Eichhorn, , Lisa Vicari, , Maja Schöne
Synopsis: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Joaquim Dos Santos, , Kemp Powers, , Justin K. Thompson, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Brian Tyree Henry, , Luna Lauren Velez
Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: Silo
Cast: Stars:, Rebecca Ferguson, , Tim Robbins, , Common, , Harriet Walter
Synopsis: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: Black Mirror
Cast: Stars:, Daniel Lapaine, , Hannah John-Kamen, , Michaela Coel, , Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Cast: Director:, Steven Caple Jr., | ,     Stars:, Anthony Ramos, , Dominique Fishback, , Luna Lauren Velez, , Dean Scott Vazquez
Synopsis: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Mandalorian
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Chris Bartlett, , Katee Sackhoff, , Carl Weathers
Synopsis: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Title: The Black Demon
Cast: Director:, Adrian Grunberg, | ,     Stars:, Omar Chaparro, , Bolivar Sanchez, , Carlos Solórzano, , Josh Lucas
Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: Fear the Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Kim Dickens, , Frank Dillane, , Cliff Curtis, , Rubén Blades
Synopsis: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Navia, , Christina Chong, , Anson Mount, , Ethan Peck
Synopsis: A prequel to Star Trek: The Original Series, the show follows the crew of the USS Enterprise under Captain Christopher Pike.

Title: Severance
Cast: Stars:, Adam Scott, , Zach Cherry, , Britt Lower, , Tramell Tillman
Synopsis: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Sam Worthington, , Zoe Saldana, , Sigourney Weaver, , Stephen Lang
Synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Doctor Who
Cast: Stars:, Jodie Whittaker, , Peter Capaldi, , Pearl Mackie, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

Cast: Directors:, Scott Beck, , Bryan Woods, | ,     Stars:, Adam Driver, , Ariana Greenblatt, , Chloe Coleman, , Nika King
Synopsis: An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: Sweet Tooth
Cast: Stars:, Nonso Anozie, , Christian Convery, , Adeel Akhtar, , Stefania LaVie Owen
Synopsis: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

Title: Elemental
Cast: Director:, Peter Sohn, | ,     Stars:, Leah Lewis, , Mamoudou Athie, , Ronnie Del Carmen, , Shila Ommi
Synopsis: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, land- and air-residents live together.

Title: Mrs. Davis
Cast: Stars:, Betty Gilpin, , Jake McDorman, , Andy McQueen, , Chris Diamantopoulos
Synopsis: Sister Simone partners with her ex-boyfriend Wiley on a globe-spanning journey to destroy Mrs. Davis, a powerful artificial intelligence.

Title: Interstellar
Cast: Director:, Christopher Nolan, | ,     Stars:, Matthew McConaughey, , Anne Hathaway, , Jessica Chastain, , Mackenzie Foy
Synopsis: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

Title: American Horror Story
Cast: Stars:, Lady Gaga, , Kathy Bates, , Angela Bassett, , Sarah Paulson
Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Title: Dune
Cast: Director:, Denis Villeneuve, | ,     Stars:, Timothée Chalamet, , Rebecca Ferguson, , Zendaya, , Oscar Isaac
Synopsis: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

Title: The Orville
Cast: Stars:, Seth MacFarlane, , Adrianne Palicki, , Penny Johnson Jerald, , Scott Grimes
Synopsis: Set 400 years in the future, finds the crew of the U.S.S. Orville continuing their mission of exploration, as they navigate both the mysteries of the universe and the complexities of their own interpersonal relationships.

Cast: Stars:, Justin Roiland, , Chris Parnell, , Spencer Grammer, , Sarah Chalke
Synopsis: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Cast: Stars:, Elisabeth Moss, , Yvonne Strahovski, , Ann Dowd, , O-T Fagbenle

Synopsis: Set 400 years in the future, finds the crew of the U.S.S. Orville continuing their mission of exploration, as they navigate both the mysteries of the universe and the complexities of their own interpersonal relationships.

Synopsis: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Zoe Saldana, , Dave Bautista, , Vin Diesel
Synopsis: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Title: Inception
Cast: Director:, Christopher Nolan, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Joseph Gordon-Levitt, , Elliot Page, , Ken Watanabe
Synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Title: The Swarm
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Karim, , Cécile de France, , Leonie Benesch, , Joshua Odjick
Synopsis: Ecological thriller about the delicate interconnectedness between mankind and Earth.

Title: Foundation
Cast: Stars:, Lou Llobell, , Jared Harris, , Lee Pace, , Leah Harvey
Synopsis: A complex saga of humans scattered on planets throughout the galaxy all living under the rule of the Galactic Empire.

Title: Titans
Cast: Stars:, Brenton Thwaites, , Anna Diop, , Ryan Potter, , Teagan Croft
Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: The Handmaid's Tale
Cast: Stars:, Elisabeth Moss, , Yvonne Strahovski, , Ann Dowd, , O-T Fagbenle
Synopsis: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

Title: Andor
Cast: Stars:, Diego Luna, , Kyle Soller, , Stellan Skarsgård, , Genevieve O'Reilly
Synopsis: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One'. In an era filled with danger, deception and intrigue, Cassian will embark on the path that is destined to turn him into a Rebel hero.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Dark
Cast: Stars:, Louis Hofmann, , Karoline Eichhorn, , Lisa Vicari, , Maja Schöne
Synopsis: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Joaquim Dos Santos, , Kemp Powers, , Justin K. Thompson, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Brian Tyree Henry, , Luna Lauren Velez
Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: Silo
Cast: Stars:, Rebecca Ferguson, , Tim Robbins, , Common, , Harriet Walter
Synopsis: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: Black Mirror
Cast: Stars:, Daniel Lapaine, , Hannah John-Kamen, , Michaela Coel, , Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Cast: Director:, Steven Caple Jr., | ,     Stars:, Anthony Ramos, , Dominique Fishback, , Luna Lauren Velez, , Dean Scott Vazquez
Synopsis: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Mandalorian
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Chris Bartlett, , Katee Sackhoff, , Carl Weathers
Synopsis: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Title: The Black Demon
Cast: Director:, Adrian Grunberg, | ,     Stars:, Omar Chaparro, , Bolivar Sanchez, , Carlos Solórzano, , Josh Lucas
Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: Fear the Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Kim Dickens, , Frank Dillane, , Cliff Curtis, , Rubén Blades
Synopsis: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Navia, , Christina Chong, , Anson Mount, , Ethan Peck
Synopsis: A prequel to Star Trek: The Original Series, the show follows the crew of the USS Enterprise under Captain Christopher Pike.

Title: Severance
Cast: Stars:, Adam Scott, , Zach Cherry, , Britt Lower, , Tramell Tillman
Synopsis: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Cast: Director:, James Cameron, | ,     Stars:, Sam Worthington, , Zoe Saldana, , Sigourney Weaver, , Stephen Lang
Synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Doctor Who
Cast: Stars:, Jodie Whittaker, , Peter Capaldi, , Pearl Mackie, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

Synopsis: An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.

Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: Sweet Tooth
Cast: Stars:, Nonso Anozie, , Christian Convery, , Adeel Akhtar, , Stefania LaVie Owen
Synopsis: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

Title: Elemental
Cast: Director:, Peter Sohn, | ,     Stars:, Leah Lewis, , Mamoudou Athie, , Ronnie Del Carmen, , Shila Ommi
Synopsis: Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, land- and air-residents live together.

Title: Mrs. Davis
Cast: Stars:, Betty Gilpin, , Jake McDorman, , Andy McQueen, , Chris Diamantopoulos
Synopsis: Sister Simone partners with her ex-boyfriend Wiley on a globe-spanning journey to destroy Mrs. Davis, a powerful artificial intelligence.

Title: Interstellar
Cast: Director:, Christopher Nolan, | ,     Stars:, Matthew McConaughey, , Anne Hathaway, , Jessica Chastain, , Mackenzie Foy
Synopsis: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

Title: American Horror Story
Cast: Stars:, Lady Gaga, , Kathy Bates, , Angela Bassett, , Sarah Paulson
Synopsis: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, a slasher summer camp, a bleak beach town and desert valley, and NYC.

Title: Dune
Cast: Director:, Denis Villeneuve, | ,     Stars:, Timothée Chalamet, , Rebecca Ferguson, , Zendaya, , Oscar Isaac
Synopsis: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

Title: The Orville
Cast: Stars:, Seth MacFarlane, , Adrianne Palicki, , Penny Johnson Jerald, , Scott Grimes
Synopsis: Set 400 years in the future, finds the crew of the U.S.S. Orville continuing their mission of exploration, as they navigate both the mysteries of the universe and the complexities of their own interpersonal relationships.

Title: Rick and Morty
Cast: Stars:, Justin Roiland, , Chris Parnell, , Spencer Grammer, , Sarah Chalke
Synopsis: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Cast: Director:, Jon Watts, | ,     Stars:, Tom Holland, , Zendaya, , Benedict Cumberbatch, , Jacob Batalon
Synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
Cast: Stars:, Patrick Stewart, , Brent Spiner, , Jonathan Frakes, , LeVar Burton
Synopsis: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's 5-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers sets off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on its own mission to go where no one has gone before.

Title: Star Trek: Picard
Cast: Stars:, Patrick Stewart, , Michelle Hurd, , Jeri Ryan, , Alison Pill
Synopsis: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard in the next chapter of his life.

Title: The X-Files
Cast: Stars:, David Duchovny, , Gillian Anderson, , Mitch Pileggi, , William B. Davis
Synopsis: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

Title: Superman & Lois
Cast: Stars:, Tyler Hoechlin, , Elizabeth Tulloch, , Alex Garfin, , Erik Valdez
Synopsis: The world's most famous superhero and comic books' most famous journalist face the pressures and complexities that come with balancing work, justice, and parenthood in today's society.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Zoe Saldana, , Dave Bautista, , Vin Diesel
Synopsis: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Title: Inception
Cast: Director:, Christopher Nolan, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Joseph Gordon-Levitt, , Elliot Page, , Ken Watanabe
Synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Title: The Swarm
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Karim, , Cécile de France, , Leonie Benesch, , Joshua Odjick
Synopsis: Ecological thriller about the delicate interconnectedness between mankind and Earth.

Title: Foundation
Cast: Stars:, Lou Llobell, , Jared Harris, , Lee Pace, , Leah Harvey
Synopsis: A complex saga of humans scattered on planets throughout the galaxy all living under the rule of the Galactic Empire.

Title: Titans
Cast: Stars:, Brenton Thwaites, , Anna Diop, , Ryan Potter, , Teagan Croft
Synopsis: Dick and Rachel, a girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and lovable Beast Boy. Together they become a team of heroes.

Title: The Handmaid's Tale
Cast: Stars:, Elisabeth Moss, , Yvonne Strahovski, , Ann Dowd, , O-T Fagbenle
Synopsis: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

Title: Andor
Cast: Stars:, Diego Luna, , Kyle Soller, , Stellan Skarsgård, , Genevieve O'Reilly
Synopsis: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One'. In an era filled with danger, deception and intrigue, Cassian will embark on the path that is destined to turn him into a Rebel hero.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Cast: Director:, Taika Waititi, | ,     Stars:, Chris Hemsworth, , Natalie Portman, , Christian Bale, , Tessa Thompson
Synopsis: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

Title: Dark
Cast: Stars:, Louis Hofmann, , Karoline Eichhorn, , Lisa Vicari, , Maja Schöne
Synopsis: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Joaquim Dos Santos, , Kemp Powers, , Justin K. Thompson, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Brian Tyree Henry, , Luna Lauren Velez
Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: Silo
Cast: Stars:, Rebecca Ferguson, , Tim Robbins, , Common, , Harriet Walter
Synopsis: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: Black Mirror
Cast: Stars:, Daniel Lapaine, , Hannah John-Kamen, , Michaela Coel, , Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Cast: Director:, Steven Caple Jr., | ,     Stars:, Anthony Ramos, , Dominique Fishback, , Luna Lauren Velez, , Dean Scott Vazquez
Synopsis: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
